features.title: Customizable New Tab Dashboard
features.description: Transform your new tab page into a personal productivity hub. Choose from multiple beautiful themes including Ninja, Geometry, Zen, and Earth backgrounds. Add widgets like analog/digital clocks, countdown timers, quick links, search bars, and text notes to create your perfect workspace.

features.title: Powerful Sessions Management
features.description: The heart of Sesh - manage all your tabs, windows, and bookmarks in one intuitive interface. Drag and drop tabs between windows, organize them into custom folders, and never lose track of important pages again. Available both as a widget on your new tab page and as a popup (Alt/Option + S).

features.title: Smart Bookmark Organization
features.description: Create custom bookmark folders and drag tabs directly into them. Search through your saved tabs, organize by projects or topics, and access everything with a single click. No more digging through cluttered bookmark bars.

features.title: Advanced Tab Operations
features.description: Bulk select tabs across multiple windows, move them between windows, close multiple tabs at once, or save entire browsing sessions. Pin important tabs, mute noisy ones, and keep your browser organized effortlessly.

features.title: Window Synchronization
features.description: Sync browser windows with bookmark folders for automatic organization. When you add or remove tabs from a synced window, the corresponding bookmark folder updates automatically. Perfect for project-based browsing.

features.title: Quick Search & Navigation
features.description: Find any tab or bookmark instantly with powerful search functionality. Search across all open tabs, bookmark folders, and saved sessions. Navigate with keyboard shortcuts and jump to any page in seconds.

features.title: Session Backup & Restore
features.description: Never lose your work again. Save entire browsing sessions as bookmark folders, and restore them later with a single click. Perfect for research projects, work sessions, or when you need to switch contexts.

features.title: Flexible Widget System
features.description: Customize your dashboard with a variety of widgets: pinned bookmarks, search engines, countdown timers, clocks, and custom text notes. Resize, reposition, and configure each widget to match your workflow perfectly.

features.title: Popup Interface & Quick Access
features.description: Access Sesh instantly with Alt/Option + S from anywhere in your browser. The compact popup interface gives you full control over tabs, windows, and bookmarks without leaving your current page. Perfect for quick organization on the go.
